reward.description:
Vietnam Family Day June 28 is coming. What a great "excuse" for you to have the opportunity to connect and share with the people you love and let lots of your rich stories be saved at Highlands Coffee's space!

- Applicable to all traditional Coffee, Tea and Freeze products of Highlands Coffee
- Incentives: When buying many products, customers receive offers directly on the total price of the combo, details for each combo you receive on the image at the counter or please contact the staff for detailed information.
- Promotion applies until 3/7
- See more details of applicable conditions at: https: //bit.ly/highlands_june
#HighlandsCoffee # Thang6 #Damchuyencungnguoithuong #Combo #Caphe #Caphetruyenthong #Tra #Freeze #PhinSuaDa #TraSenVang #FreezeTraXanh
reward.title: REALLY MANY OFFERS FOR JUNE COMBO TALKS WITH THE LOVE_1
